description: Shell script to use OpenAI's ChatGPT and DALL-E from the terminal. More information: https://github.com/0xacx/chatGPT-shell-cli.

useCases.syntax: chatgpt --prompt "{{What is the regex to match an email address?}}"

useCases.description: Start in chat mode using a specific [m]odel (default is gpt-3.5-turbo):
Start in chat mode with an [i]nitial prompt:
useCases.syntax: chatgpt --init-prompt "{{You are Rick, from Rick and Morty. Respond to questions using his mannerism and include insulting jokes.}}"

useCases.description: Pipe the result of a command to chatgpt as a prompt:
useCases.syntax: echo "{{How to view running processes on Ubuntu?}}" | chatgpt
